meanings.definition: Used to express relief, exhaustion, or satisfaction.
meanings.sent1: Whew, that was a long day at school!
meanings.sent2: I finally finished my homework, whew!
meanings.sent3: Whew, I thought I lost my favorite toy, but it was just under the bed.
meanings.sent4: After running the marathon, I crossed the finish line and let out a loud 'whew'.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of whew washed over me as I sank into the comfy chair.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or amazement.
meanings.sent1: Whew, that magic trick really amazed me!
meanings.sent2: Whew, I can't believe how fast time flies.
meanings.sent3: Whew, the magician pulled a rabbit out of the hat!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display left the crowd saying 'whew' in awe.
meanings.sent5: As the curtain fell, the audience let out a collective 'whew' at the twist ending.
